_source.question: How to update form 60
_source.answer: FORM60 number can be updated in Finacle CRM> CIF Individual/Non individual>General details>Document details tab>Tax document >FORM60. Even after updating FORM60 at cust id level it is mandatory to capture FORM60 details at transaction level when ever cash deposit in account in a day exceeds 50K

_source.question: Which option should user use to inquire drawing power of OD/Demand Loan account?
_source.answer: User can use HACLHM menu option to inquire drawing Power of OD/Demand Loan account by selecting Function drop down as Inquire and drawing power radio button.

_source.question: What is the menu option for Generation of Demand Loan interest.
_source.answer: User can use HLADGEN menu option for manual and adhoc interest run in Demand Loan.

_source.question: Can Demand Loan/Overdraft Account open against multiple deposits?
_source.answer: Yes, as per process Demand Loan/Overdraft Account can be opened against multiple fixed deposits.

_source.question: The customer does not have custid in a single name, how to allot lockers to him?
_source.answer:
• Refer circular 9564, branch has to obtain non i-kit AOF along with necessary KYC and send across to RPC for Custid creation.
• Post Cust ID created by RPC, branch to allot the locker through LCCM.

_source.question: How can user inquire account balance of Term Deposit?
_source.answer: User can use Inquire function in HAMCTD menu and then click on Add Info Tab. User  should click on A/c Balance Details graphic icon in this tab for checking account balance of Term Deposits.

_source.question: How to delink the operative a/c from FFD account
_source.answer: Kindly browse to Finacle: HACM > Function Scheme Detail > Link operative Account-Remove the SB Account no> This transaction needs to be verified by the verifier
variation: How to delink the operative a/c from FFD account

_source.question: Can Demand Loan/Overdraft Account be opened against third party FD?
_source.answer: Yes, Demand Loan/Overdraft Account can be opened against against third party FD. In HKWIKLAD, user will enter the third party FD account number in the Deposit A/c fields against which Demand Loan/Overdraft Account is availed. When Submit is clicked, multiple Collateral ID will be generated against the FD. The Collateral ID should be verified by using HSCLM menu option and Verify function.

_source.question: Which option should user use to verify the nomination facility at account level?
_source.answer: User has to use HACM menu option by selecting drop down Function “V-Verify” verify the nomination facility at account level after visiting mandatory tabs.

_source.question: What do I do if I am unable to cancel DD, system message " Non system Demand draft"?
_source.answer:
1. This message is seen when more than one DDs are made in a single tran.
2. Invoke menu option HDDII > Enter DD number and date > Then inquire for your respective transaction Id and part tran no.(example_M1234/2)
3. Invoke menu option HDDC for Cancellation of DD > Enter DD no.,Tran id with Part tran no. and Date of issuance > Click on GO.
4. Then DD records are fetched > Click on Submit to successfully cancel the DD

_source.question: How to post a tran ?
_source.answer: A maker level user can create and post the transaction less than Rs. 50,000 by directly clicking “Post” tab once all the details are enterted correctly in debit and credit part transaction. For transaction more than Rs. 50,000, checker level user has to   select P- Post from the  drop-down list in front of “Function” field, click on “GO” and press “Submit”.

_source.question: How to modify a tran ?
_source.answer: User can do modify a tran when that tran is at enter stage i.e. before posting. User has to   select M- Modify from the  drop-down list in front of “Function” field, click on “GO”, do the desired modification and press “Submit” or “Post” as the case may be.

_source.question: Account freeze
Loan account interest calculation or HLADGEN option.
_source.answer: HLADGEN is the menu option for initiating the interest calculation process in Loan account. In fact this menu is used to raise both principal demand and interest demand. If for any reason, principal demand is not raised or skipped as a part of End of Day process, then when this menu is initiated the system can raise demand based on the repayment schedule.  The system also calculates interest and interest demand can also be raised as per the frequency.
variation: Loan account interest calculation or HLADGEN option.

_source.question: GIB Application - Login not working
_source.answer:
GIB login through I Core has been enabled. Kindly check the same in I Core selecting 'GIB' in 'Solution'. Please follow below steps if users are facing certificate issue.
1) Click on Certificate Error text on the Browser URL
2) Click on View Certificates
3) Click on Install Certificates
4) Select Place all certificates option
5) Click on Browse
6) Select Trusted Root folder
7) Click Ok
8) On the pop-up window select “Yes”
9) Click Ok
10) On the same browser on another tab, enter the following URL:
https://gibtaxadm.icicibankltd.com/corp/AuthenticationController?FORMSGROUP_ID__=RMAuthenticationFG&__START_TRAN_FLAG__=Y&FG_BUTTONS__=LOAD&ACTION.LOAD=Y&RMAuthenticationFG.LOGIN_FLAG=2&BANK_ID=ICI&LOGINTYPE=SSOLOGIN
11) Follow the same steps from Step 1 to 9
12) Close the browser and relogin to I-Core

_source.question: Unable to print DD
_source.answer:
1. If no record is fetched in HDDPALL option for printing, HDDPRNT option can be tried.                                                                                                                                           2. If PRINT_USER_ID gets updated and corresponding error message is displayed on screen, that specific user only can print the DD.                                 
3. If there is any printer issue while printing of DD or user fails to acknowledge after proper printing of DD, then the respective inventory gets automatically move to DL/CAN location. However it can be moved back from DL/CAN to ZZ/EXT to DL/DL1 to Employee Location through HIMC option so that printing can be reinitiated on the respective inventory or white sheet as the case may be by the concerned user-id if PRINT_USER_ID is tagged in the system.                                                                                                                                             4. While printing a duplicate DD through HDDRPRNT, there is a display message "Duplicate DD issued" in red which is only for information and not an error message.                                                                                                                        5. When duplicate DD is printed, 'Print Advice flg' should always be N. Otherwise inventory number will not be visible while printing may go through.                                                                                                                                           6. For duplicate DD printing, the details of original DD only need to be entered along with Tran-id & Part-tran-srl-num.                                                           
7. Inability for printing a DD that is issued in a merged entity where there is no inventory maintenance, then HDDT option needs to be enabled with proper approval from application team to transfer the respective amount directly from DD.CENPAY a/c amount directly from DD.CENPAY a/c.

_source.question: FD is not getting closed/renewed automatically
_source.answer:
Kindly check following in HACMTD menu option: </br>
1. In HAMCTD menu option, the Auto renewal Flag needs to be Y for Auto renewal of FD</br>
2. If auto closure is required, Auto closure flag is required to be YES in HACMTD menu option.</br>
3. Apart from above checks If lien is applied in the account as ULIEN, system will not renew or Close the FD account.</br>
4. If Account is Debit/Total Freeze by any reason, system will not PICK the FD for Auto renewal or Closure

_source.question: What is process to be followed in I-Core to issue Duplicate Demand draft
_source.answer:
Branch Staff needs to check if the instrument is still unpaid in i-core by using the HDDSM option. 
After confirming that the draft is still in the unpaid status through HDDSM option, the Branch Staff needs to report the loss of draft through HDDLOST option. 
For issuance of duplicate draft Branch Staff has to invoke the option HDDD in the main menu of i-core. 
Branch Staff needs to click on submit for committing the transaction. This would ensure that duplicate DD has been issued in i-core.
For printing of duplicate draft branch Staff has to invoke option HDDRPRNT in the main menu. 
Please Note : To fetch DD for printing below details of old DD need to be entered in HDDRPRNT:
1.DD number
2.DD created tran id with part tran id (Example – M334565/2- in this tran id will be M334565 and part tran id is 2)
3.DD issuance date
variation: What is process to be followed in I-Core to issue Duplicate Demand draft

_source.question: Physical DD is printed but branch is not able to view in system DD details?
_source.answer:
1. Invoke menu option HDDII > Enter transaction details > If DD is printed successfully then DD details will be seen.

3. DD should be reprinted on blank paper until DD record moves to next Inventory number in system
4. Once Inventory is committed then again confirm DD status using HDDII.

_source.question: How to use ICIVAM menu option in I-core to map teller and vault accounts?
_source.answer:
1. BM / DBM can map an employee with any vault account or teller account irrespective of whether the employee is presently mapped to a Vault or teller account.
2. An employee can be mapped with Vault account only if the employee has cash verification powers.
3. System will allow change of mapping of a teller account only if balance in teller a/c is zero.
4. At any given point an employee can be mapped only to a single account, either Vault a/c or Teller a/c. Thus, if an employee is mapped to an A/c (Vault/Teller) and same employee is being mapped with another account, the earlier mapping is de-mapped.
5. While mapping please note : - If the employee id is 102235,then the input would be 102235; If the vault account is ‘0004CSMAIN01’, the input should be CSMAIN01 in Vault A/c RefCode;If the vault account is ‘0004CSTELL01’ the input should be CSTELL1 in Vault A/c RefCode.
6. "" Add"" option in ICIVAM is used to map an employee who is not already mapped either to vault or teller account and ""Modify"" to change the mapping of an employee from the existing mapping or to de-map the existing mapping.

Before mapping any teller to branch user, BM/DBM has to check the current available tellers position by invoking the HTCPIAC menu option. From the available BM/DBM has to select one.

Please Note: In case the teller  account which you want to map  is already mapped to any other user and if that user not there in that sol id then de-mapping can not be done from branch end. BM/DBM has to mark a mail to DPC team to get it de-mapped. Once it is de-mapped branch DBM/BM can map the teller to the other branch user
variation: How to use ICIVAM menu option in I-core to map teller and vault accounts?

_source.question: When a second user pulls the mirror image copy of the CIF ID from Business tray for re-work  then what happens to the entry which was initially pulled by some other user in his Self tray ?
_source.answer:
If the initial user who has pulled in his self tray clears the entry end to end as per the requirement and commits it, then the mirror image copy of the same entry will not reflect in Business tray as pending.
2. Same logic is applicable for the second user who pulls the mirror image copy of the CIF ID from Business tray for re-work in absence of the initial user who had already pulled in his Self tray.  Here, if the second user clears it and commits the entry first, then the other copy of the same which was in initial users self tray would disappear.

_source.question: Which option should user use for verification of LAFD?
_source.answer: To verify the LAFD account, verifier has to verify the linking of Collateral ID generated on ODFD creation using menu option HSCLM. User have to use HSCLM menu option for verification of LAFD. User will select Function drop down as Verify and radio button Linkage Type as A/c. User will have to mention the A/c ID and Collateral ID in the respective fields.  After filling up aforementioned fields, user should click on Accept button. System will show the details of Collateral value, Margin percent, LTV percent and apportioned value. HCLM menu should not be used for verification of LAFD.                                                                         If the verification of linking of Collateral ID is not done then sanction limit and drawing power does not get set up in the OD/DL account and lien is not marked on the underlying security term deposit.
variation: Which option should user use for verification of LAFD?

_source.answer: User can use HLAUPAY menu option to make unscheduled repayment of Demand Loan amount This menu option can be use to do partial repayment of Demand loan account also. _source.question: DD printing issue
_source.answer:
1. If no record is fetched in HDDPALL option for printing, HDDPRNT option can be tried.
2. If PRINT_USER_ID gets updated and corresponding error message is displayed on screen, that specific user only can print the DD.
3. If there is any printer issue while printing of DD or user fails to acknowledge after proper printing of DD, then the respective inventory gets automatically move to DL/CAN location. However it can be moved back from DL/CAN to ZZ/EXT to DL/DL1 to Employee Location through HIMC option so that printing can be reinitiated on the respective inventory or white sheet as the case may be by the concerned user-id if PRINT_USER_ID is tagged in the system.  
4. While printing a duplicate DD through HDDRPRNT, there is a display message "Duplicate DD issued" in red which is only for information and not an error message.
5. When duplicate DD is printed, 'Print Advice flg' should always be N. Otherwise inventory number will not be visible while printing may go through. 
6. For duplicate DD printing, the details of original DD only need to be entered along with Tran-id & Part-tran-srl-num.
7. Inability for printing a DD that is issued in a merged entity where there is no inventory maintenance, then HDDT option needs to be enabled with proper approval from application team to transfer the respective amount directly from DD.CENPAY a/c amount directly from DD.CENPAY a/c.
variation: DD has already been printed but system is showing pending
already printed this DD and still showing pending for printing

_source.question: What is process to be followed  to delete CRM entry if CIF modification is in rejected status?
_source.answer:
Going forward please do not “Reject” any record if it has not to be approved and it has only to be “Closed”(if not to be approved).
Please follow the steps below to delete the record from pending status.
Step 1-
Now with any user’s login, please go to Entity Queue  >> Choose Business Center Group, Maker, Customer and Select Business Center in Tray Type, Group, Entity Type & BC respectively>> Enter the CIF ID in Entity ID field and Click SUBMIT button >> Record would be displayed >> Tick the only check box of the record >> Right click on the record and Choose Entity – Get as owner >> Entity would be moved to self-tray

Step 2-
 Now with same user’s login >> In entity queue Choose Self, Saved & Customer in Tray Type, Action and Entity type respectively>> Click SUBMIT button >> Record would be displayed >> Tick the only check box of the record >> Right click on the record and Choose Entity – Delete >> Entity would be deleted from pending status.

Note: If the record is not displayed with a user’s login in Step1, please try step 1 with any other user in the branch following step 2 too. It should work
variation: What is process to be followed  to delete CRM entry if CIF modification is in rejected status?

_source.question: FD receipt printing
_source.answer:
Below are the FD receipt printing check points:
1. Kindly check the Print_Flag is given as ‘Y’ in HACMTD option under Scheme details tab.
2. If the Flag is Y branch will be able to print the receipt 
3. While printing receipt through menu option HDRP/HDUDRP branch needs to give the Sol_id as Deposit issue branch Sol_id  else system will give message as “Record Not Found”
Note: FD receipt Printing process is now Automated hence printing of Receipts will be done by concern CPC team and the same will be dispatched to the customer on registered mailing address.

conv_ans.answer: Check if the 'Minor Indicator' of the customer in CRM is 'Y'. Kindly modify the indicator to 'N' in General Details and verify the record in CRM. Once this is done, you will be able to complete this transaction in FINCORE.

_source.question: RD Maturity date issue
_source.answer:
One month after the last installment date.
The Banking rule for maturity of RD is as follows – Ostensible due date or one month from the last installment, whichever is later.

"Maturity Date" means the Deposit shall be due for repayment on the date falling on completion of one calendar month from the date of payment of the last Installment or on completion of the Tenure, whichever is later

_source.question: How to delete cookies and temporary files?
_source.answer:
1) Logout from existing I-Core login session and Close all internet explorer browser windows.
2) Click on Windows 'Start' button → Click on 'Run' option. If 'Run' option is not displayed, press 'Windows' key and 'R' key on the key board.
3) In the window, enter '%temp%' and click OK.
4) A new window with temporary files will open. Delete all the files ny pressing SHIFT+DELETE keys.
5) Now open a new internet explorer browser. Go to Tools → Internet Options → Click 'Delete' under 'General' tab. Tick all the check boxes and click Delete.

6) Click Settings → click 'View files' in next window → A new window with Cookies files is displayed. Delete the files through SHIFT+DELETE keys and close the window.
7) Now go to File in internet explorer window >> Choose 'New Session' and login to I-Core and try this transaction again.

_source.question: i am unable to fetch the finacle URL

1. Delete the temp internet file from run → %temp%.
2. Delete IE history and cookies from Tools → Internet option → General Tab → Browsing History → Delete → Select all the option except the one on the top 'Preserve Favorites Website Data'
3. Then go to settings → select the option 'Every time I visit the webpage' and update the 'Disk Space to use' =  8
4. Click on view files button and delete the cookies.
5. Go to control panel → Click on JAVA icon and delete the temp internet files (available in General tab).

Once done please reboot the system and check with fresh login.

_source.question: In comparison to Finacle 7x, what are the menu options used for inquiry of foreign and domestic bills in 10x?
_source.answer: In 7x, users use menu option FBM and BM for inquiry of foreign and domestic bills respectively. Where as in 10x, the users can inquire export and domestic outward bills using the menu option MEOB and import and domestic inward bills using the menu option MIIB.

_source.question: Can user Cancel the modification of FD?
_source.answer: Yes, checker can cancel the entry by choosing X-Cancel function in HACMTD menu option.

_source.question: Can user check the Saving /Current Account balance by using HACMTD Menu option.
_source.answer: No, user will have to use HACM menu option for checking account balance of Saving /Current Account.

_source.question: Which option should user use to inquire about Interest rate code and interest Credit A/c ID for FD account?
_source.answer: User can click Interest & tax Tab under HACMTD menu option to inquire about Interest rate code and interest Credit A/c ID for FD account. Tax Category can be also checked under same tab.

_source.question: Which menu option should user use for opening of Overdraft (OD) / Demand Loan (DL) against Term deposits?
_source.answer: User will use HKWIKLAD menu option for opening of Overdraft (OD) / Demand Loan (DL) against Term deposits. The functionality of the menu is same that of 7x. There is an additional field name “Mode of Operation” to update mode of operation in the menu. When “Submit” is created, the OD/DL account gets generated along with unique Collateral ID. This Collateral ID links the OD/DL account with the underlying security FD account. User should note down the OD/ DL account ID and Collateral ID for verification.

_source.question: How can user use Trial Closure of Term Deposits?
_source.answer: User can use L-Trial Close function under HCAACTD menu option and enter the A/c ID. This closure need not be verified. System will auto populate the Customer name, closure value date and Withdrawal Amt (Principal).

_source.question: Does user has option to print the stop payment advice at the verification level?
_source.answer: No, the Stop payment advice is generated in background after verification of Stop payment of the cheque in the account. User has to use HPR menu option to print stop payment advice.

_source.question: Which option should user use to verify revoke Stop payment of the cheque in the account?
_source.answer: User has to use HSPPAU menu option by selecting drop down Function “V-Verify” to verify revoke Stop payment of the cheque in the account.

_source.question: Can user modify the Term deposit account details by using HACM menu option?
_source.answer: No, user has to use HACMTD menu option by selecting drop down Function “M-Modify” for modifying details for Term Deposit accounts.

_source.question: Which option should user use for verification of closure of Term Deposits account?
_source.answer: User have to use HCAACVTD menu option for verification of closure of Term Deposits account. User can use same menu option for cancellation of closure of term deposits.

_source.question: Which option should user use to verify freeze in the account?
_source.answer: User has to use HAFSM menu option by selecting drop down Function “V-Verify” to verify freeze details in the account.

_source.question: During Verification, can the Verifier see the signature ?
_source.answer: Yes, the link is available under General Detail tab.

_source.question: Which option should user use to create and verify standing instruction in the account?
_source.answer: User has to use HSIM menu option to create and verify standing instruction in the account

conv_ans.question: It is Accounted
conv_ans.answer:
Check any of the following:

1. Whether Adjustment is made for difference in compounding factor or for Interest on TDS payout from suspense account

2. Check whether the present customer status code denotes the status as senior citizen. If it is not set to senior citizen, interest paid would be less.

3. When TDS is deducted in a FD, interest will not be paid on the TDS amount from the date of such deduction. Kindly check if the referred difference was accounted for the interest portion on TDS.

_source.question: Can Maker after submission, take the CIF ID from Business tray as Owner/Get as assignee to do modifications/re-work in it ?
_source.answer: Yes, he can pull it to his tray with above options, however once the CIF is submitted for verification for any further re-work it requires a Checker to either Approve ,Reject or Close the CIF ID from his tray to enable the maker to re-work on it. Thus, maker can not make any modifications/re-work  unless a checker rejects the CIF from his tray.

_source.question: How to delink the operative a/c from FFD account
_source.answer: Kindly browse to Finacle: HACM > Function Scheme Detail > Link operative Account-Remove the SB Account no> This transaction needs to be verified by the verifier

_source.question: Which option should user use to make the full and final repayment of Demand Loan?
_source.answer: User should use HPAYOFF menu option for full and final repayment of Demand Loan amount. Interest on Demand Loan outstanding balance will generated and debited to the Demand Loan first. While using HPAYOFF, the outstanding debit balance in Demand Loan account will be recovered from the operative account which is to be debited and the DL account will become zero. After full repayment of Demand Loan outstanding balance, user have to raise SR for closure of the account as per existing process mentioned in circular 9557.

_source.question: Which option should user use for modification in Overdraft account?
_source.answer: User should select Function Modify drop down in HACM menu option for modification in Overdraft account.

_source.question: Which option should user use to request for cheque book  in the account?
_source.answer: User has to use HICICBRQ menu option to request for cheque book in the account.

_source.question: Can user modify download to PBF flag by using HACM menu option?
_source.answer: No, download to PBF flag is maintained at data base level and user does not have to modify at account level.

_source.question: Which option should user use to create Stop payment of the cheque in the account ?
_source.answer: User has to use HSPP menu option by selecting drop down Function “S-Stop Pay” to create Stop payment of the cheque in the account.

_source.question: Which option should user use to avail the nomination facility at account level?
_source.answer: User has to use HACM menu option by selecting drop down Function “M-Modify under Scheme tab tick the check box “Nomination” and then go to Nomination tab to create nomination facility at account level.

_source.question: Which option should user use to print the customer’s account statement?
_source.answer: User has to use HPSP menu option to generate the customer’s account statement and user has to use HPR menu option to view and print the statement.

_source.question: Which menu options can be used for printing of DD in I core?
_source.answer:
1. For DD printing use HDDPRNT/ HDDPALL, currently HDDBP menu option is under upgradation with tech team request you to avoid using this option till further notice.
2. Please ensure that you keep printing the same DD until you see the next Inventory number getting captured in your "Inventory number field" which then confirms that your DD is printed successfully
3. Once DD is printed then please ensure that we check the DD status in HDDII before handing over the inventory to the customer

_source.question: How to make payment of DD, crediting pointing type of office account?
_source.answer:
1. Invoke HDDMP menu option >Enter required details on first page >Click on Go > Enter DD number >Press tab > Select appropriate DD from the list >Confirm DD details and click on submit > Transaction is in entered stage
2. To Post and Verify the payment transaction,  Verifier to invoke HTM menu option >On Credit leg check, A-Additional details > Click on Go> Go to next leg >Click on Submit button. Now transaction is posted successfully.

_source.question: Bank Induced Break-open has been completed and Vendor has given a new Key. How to bring this locker into Available/Vacant for further allotments?
_source.answer:
1. Use LCKMM menu option to update the Key Number and verify the same through LCKMMV menu option.

2. This menu is mandatory for bringing the status from Blocked to Available status post break open (Bank Induced).

_source.question: Can I modify a nomination already updated in the system?
_source.answer:

2. To change Date of nomination the branch user must get this facility in I-core

_source.question: How to post by part tran ?
_source.answer: Clicking on tab “ post by part transaction”.  From the list of debit and credit part trans select the trans to be posted and click “Submit” Then click OK to end the course.

_source.question: How to use HCAAC option for account closure ?
_source.answer:
Please do as follows to close the a/c 
1. Run HCACC for collecting charges if any and verify the same.
2. Run HACINT wherein "To Date" should be given as one day before the date of closure and "Dr./Cr.Int." field should 
be entered with B (both).
3. Finally do HCAAC with "Run Int.Calc Now?" flag Y to
run interest again for one day that will close the account.
variation: How to use HCAAC option for account closure ?

_source.question: Cash transactions not allowed in other SOL accounts - SRV error- intersol transaction not allowed
_source.answer:
Officer while initiating the case has selected the Anywhere cash transaction as No for the account. The pop up also gets displayed on screen when the option is selected as “No”


At the time of case initiation there is an option to select if the customer wants anywhere cash deposit transaction or not.. If the option is selected as Y then the anywhere cash transaction would be allowed and if the same is selected as N then it will not allowed.

Branch case use below option if the customer wants to allow / Disallow anywhere cash deposit by giving request at branch..  

Option to be used : ICIUPL

Format as below: 
Indicator : PRV
Account no.|Sol id|Y (Mention Y to allow and N to not allow)
File to be save as .dat (ex cashallow.dat and format while saving will be .txt)

Post upload use option : HPR to check where the changes is done successful.
variation: Cash transactions not allowed in other SOL accounts - SRV error- intersol transaction not allowed
